## Objectives

- We study how climate affects forest growth and dynamics

- We detect ecological changes in forest ecosystems

- We contribute to sustainable forest management in a changing world

## Research themes

- Dendroclimatology

- Forest dynamics

- Forest carbon and productivity

- Global change
